Storyline:
From the makers of MADAGASCAR and KUNG FU PANDA, TURBO is a high-velocity 3D comedy about a snail who dares to dream big - and fast.
After a freak accident infuses him with the power of super-speed, Turbo kicks into overdrive and embarks on an
extraordinary journey to achieve the seemingly impossible: competing in the world's fastest race, the Indianapolis 500.
With the help of his tricked-out streetwise snail crew, this ultimate underdog puts his heart and shell on the line to prove
that no dream is too big, and no dreamer too small.
